item.title: The OS Module
item.description: Learning Objectives Concepts Retrieving information from the underlying system using Node Skills Learn to use the os module and its objects Operating system module The Node.

item.title: Labs for OS Module
item.description: This lab will have you use the os module and its objects to retrieve and interact with system information.

item.title: The Path Module
item.description: Path module The path module provides a way of working with directories and file paths.

item.title: The FS Module
item.description: Learning Objectives Concepts Using Node to interact with the file system. Skills Learn to use the fs module Reading Receiving arguments File system module Node can interact with files on your system.

item.title: Error Handling
item.description: Learning Objectives Concepts Error handling in Node. Skills Learn to write an error-first callback.

item.title: Streams
item.description: Working with streams An option when working with the larger files or http request/response is to use Streams.

item.title: The Event Module
item.description: Learning Objectives Concepts Event Driven Programming The Events Module Creating Events Triggering Events Cleaning up Events Event Driven Programming What is event driven programming?
